review.title: Clean and friendly
review.comment: I was truly amazed at the price of the location in the city. The bed was comfortable, we slept just fine. The view was great, for a few days stay I highly recommend staying here. It is all you need for a short stay. Very clean and if you needed anything the staff was there to help. We will be back!

review.title: Friendliest Staff!
review.comment: I was truly amazed at the price of the location in the city. The bed was comfortable, we slept just fine. The view was great, for a few days stay I highly recommend staying here. It is all you need for a short stay. Very clean and if you needed anything the staff was there to help. We will be back!

review.title: Friendliest Staff!
review.comment: Alexis, Isaiah and China (but sooo many others, I don't know names!) went above and beyond since the moment we stepped foot in the hotel. They are so personable, attentive helpful and caring of their guests. Also super funny and entertaining. We ran into maintenance taking care of trash while waiting for the elevator and these two men were so kind and such happy beings. The hotel itself is beautiful, extremely well-kept, and quiet. I slept so well throughout my entire stay-- the beds are super comfortable. The rooms are also very well designed. I highly recommend staying at this hotel and will definitely stay here again when I come back to NY! Thank you Motto staff for such excellent service :)

review.title: Clean and friendly
review.comment: We recently chose Hotel Miranda for an overnight in NYC and were so glad we did. Our stay started off with a warm and friendly greeting from the staff at the front desk. Check in was easy and efficient. We found our room to be clean and comfortable- brand new! Quite beautiful. The view from our room as the sun was setting was spectacular! After an evening at the theatre ( highly recommend The Music Man!), the bar was open for a night cap. Breakfast was fresh and delicious served by more friendly staff. Our overall experience was exceptional! We’ll be back

review.title: Great location and service
review.comment: Yasmin... Seriously a big thank you for being accomodations for finding the right room for me and being patient while I got my CC straight. You smiled and never seemed to mind. That goes a long way. SHUKRAN!!

review.title: Great stay for Mum, Sis and I
review.comment: I was truly amazed at the price of the location in the city. The bed was comfortable, we slept just fine. The view was great, for a few days stay I highly recommend staying here. It is all you need for a short stay. Very clean and if you needed anything the staff was there to help. We will be back!

review.title: Great location and service
review.comment: Staff very nice and helpful. Very nice and clean rooms. Wonderful view from the room. Wishes are taken into account by the staff. Fast elevators. Cleaning in the room was carried out as requested. A top accommodation.
